description: Pristine Carriage Home in New Hope's Premiere 55+ Adult Community, Fox Hunt Preserve! Mr. and Mrs. Clean live here and this home sparkles! This Stone Front 1 Bedroom/1 Bath Home has an Open Floor Plan, First Floor Primary Suite, and is filled with Natural Light. The Gorgeous Turned Staircase is the Focal Point of the entry with a Large Formal Dining Room with Chair Rail to the Right. title: Extraordinary 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home
description:
1345 S Hicks St, Philadelphia, PA 19146
Welcome to 1345 S. Hicks, an extraordinary 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home that stands out from the crowd with its unparalleled design. As you step inside, the first floor reveals a spacious eat-in kitchen adorned with Kraftmaid cherry wood cabinets, a granite counter breakfast bar boasting a striking waterfall edge, and top-of-the-line Whirlpool Gold stainless steel appliances.As you ascend to the second floor, you'll be greeted by the abundance of light pouring in through the stairwell windows. This level comprises a full bath equipped with a tiled walk-in shower, complete with custom glass doors, porcelain flooring, a Fresca toilet, floating European fixtures with Duravit tops, and a Sumerain faucet. On the third floor, you'll discover the magnificent master bedroom suite, complete with a front balcony. The expansive bathroom is adorned with a walk-in tile shower, enhanced by a Velux skylight, a custom glass shower door, a Fresca toilet, floating European fixtures with Duravit tops, and a Sumerain faucet. The master bedroom also features large sliding doors that open up to the balcony, where you can savor a morning coffee while enjoying breathtaking views of the center-city skyline.
Each bedroom in this exceptional home boasts custom wardrobe units, providing ample storage space to keep everything organized. The fully finished basement/den area serves as a versatile family room, offering additional storage spaces both in the front and rear. A convenient laundry closet equipped with a full-size washer and dryer is also available.
Situated on a quiet street, you'll enjoy excellent walkability, with a mere ten-minute stroll to East Passyunk, home to some of the finest restaurants in Philadelphia. Indulge in the culinary delights of Noord, Laurel, Burrata, Fond, Barcelona, Black & Brew, Birra, and many more.
Do you want to see the house located in a beautiful place or know something? Send me your contact information.

There is no dedicated living room in this apartment. There's a very spacious kitchen with room for a table, and there's a large bedroom where you could fit a couch, desk, etc. in addition to your bed.
The price includes water and gas. Tenants are responsible for their own electric. The heat is gas, so is paid by the landlord.
There are a few closets in the apartment and no storage in the rest of the building.
Laundry is coin-operated, in the basement, shared with the tenants of the other three apartments.
There is a large yard for all tenants to share.
Pets are ok, small refundable deposit required.
No smoking.
We are a small company, management and owners all live close by in Germantown. Maintenance and repairs are done with independent contractors, there are no employees on call.
First, last, and security required to sign lease/receive keys.
Note- the kitchen cabinets are no longer green/gray!
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:
We always prefer to rent to folks who are already part of the community, so if you're in Germantown, we'd love to keep you here.
We look for income to be 3 times the amount of rent, because we want to know that you can afford it. So here that would mean income of around $2925/month.
We want tenants who will be considerate of their neighbors in terms of sound and how they use the space. Other tenants in this building are fairly quiet and considerate, but friendly. The floors are hardwood so often rugs may be required to deal with issues of sound traveling between floors.
INSTRUCTIONS:
If this sounds like you, please send a message. You will be asked to fill out a *brief* application prior to the scheduling of a showing. Know that we do not waste time showing our apartments to as many people as possible. So if you meet the criteria and you fill out the application, you are not wasting your time. There is no application fee.

title: Welcome home to this one-of-a-kind retreat in Fishing Creek~**
description: Peace, tranquility, and privacy! Welcome home to this one-of-a-kind retreat in Fishing Creek Estates featuring spectacular living spaces that have been lovingly maintained and updated with many features and upgrades throughout! Make your way into the home by the paver walkway leading up to the front door. Step inside where you're greeted by the open foyer and living room with vaulted ceilings and hardwood floors. Head through the bright dining room into the kitchen where you'll find gorgeous custom cabinets, a large island with seating, granite countertops and a full pantry for extra storage. Breakfast area off the kitchen features vaulted ceilings and skylights that bring in a flood of natural light. Family room showcases a beautiful wood-burning stone fireplace, perfect for those chilly evenings. Make your way upstairs to the primary bedroom suite with hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings, walk in closet and en-suite bath. Two additional spacious bedrooms and a full guest bath complete the second floor. The living space in this home continues downstairs on the partially finished lower level with interior access. A large additional living space with a wet bar and full bath can be used as a bedroom, rec room, hobby room, game room or even as separate private living quarters with rear entrance. Large windows and patio doors allow plenty of daylight and access to the rear patio and yard. A wildlife lover’s dream!  Out back you'll find a spacious trex composite deck and railing with a bridge/walkway connecting to the custom-built standalone two car detached heated garage & studio apartment. The studio apartment features over 375 sq feet of additional living space with living room, full bath and kitchenette that makes a fantastic art studio, in-law suite or private office space.  Behind the garage is a custom-built workshop/shed with composite flooring and tongue and groove knotty pine walls with attic storage and full electric, a handyman’s dream!  Well-X-Trol Well Water Holding Tank in 2016. Roof in 2017 with new gutters and downspouts, premium SS gutter guard and 2 solar roof fans with electric override. Generac 20KW whole house generator with transfer switching and 500-gallon buried propane tank. Home includes a Nutone central vac system, ultraviolet water purification system, Culligan water neutralization unit and sediment filter and a radon mitigation system. The features and upgrades of this home simply can't be put into words, a must-see! Schedule your private tour today.

title: Newly Renovated 3 Bedroom in Fishtown
description:
Newly renovated, this 3 bedroom / 1.5 bathroom single family townhome features a large outdoor space, in-unit laundry, central a/c, and sleek modern finishes throughout. Step into the inviting living room where hardwood floors and recessed lighting elevate the space. An exposed brick wall follows you back past the central staircase and into the dining area.
The elongated kitchen starts with a half bath for added convenience and features brand new finishes & fixtures including white shaker cabinets, chic geometric backsplash, and high end stainless steel appliances.
Head upstairs to view 3 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. The sunny front bedroom is largest, while the other 2 bedrooms are a bit smaller, all of them offering good sunlight and closet space. A clean basement provides a washer and dryer, along with plenty of storage.
The lovely back patio is the perfect setting to bask in the sunshine, enjoy fresh air, and create cherished memories with family and friends.
Pets allowed case by case. 2 Pet Maximum

A large, sunfilled living room with additional space by the front door offers the flexibility to use this space in a variety of ways that fit your needs. The formal dining room is big in scale with 3 large windows to set the tone and offers the perfect place for all your important meals.  The sunfilled kitchen offers an additional dining area plus a place to meal prep and cook!  Gas stove, dishwasher, refrigerator, ample cabinets, and storage areas are some of the highlights plus you will find access to the backyard and basement.  Second Floor Details: Hardwood floors (Under the carpets) 3 great-sized bedrooms with closets complete with hall bath.  Third Floor:  Amazing space just waiting to be renovated.  Basement:  Flexible space for office/den/playroom just waiting to be renovated as well as a separate workshop complete with laundry room, toilet, mechanical area and access to the back yard.

title: 3 bed house at Philadelphia
description:
Welcome to this Bright Townhome located on a quiet street, just steps away from Main Street in Manayunk.  Enter into an open floor plan. Throughout, you will find soaring ceilings, beautiful hickory hardwood flooring, recessed lighting and oversized windows, all creating an airy ambiance.  The Kitchen, which is centrally located has a spacious island with marble counter tops along with stainless steel appliances and a wine refrigerator. The Dining room is on one side and Living area on the other, which allows for great entertaining flow.  The powder room is also on the main level.  The lower level is also finished with additional family space, office, exercise, whatever your needs may be.  Three oversized closets allow for extra storage. Walk up to the 2nd level to find two generous bedrooms with reach in closets and a center hall tiled bath with double vanity and a tub shower.  The laundry room is conveniently located on this level.  Continue up to the Primary Suite level, having a large hallway, double doors that allow privacy and access to the primary area with two walk-in custom California closets, spacious bedroom and a huge Bath with soaking tub, stall shower with a bench, separate water closet and a double vanity.   As you ascend to the top floor, there is a prep area with refrigerator & cabinetry then out to the impressive oversized roof deck with lovely views. A fabulous space for entertaining & relaxation!     Additionally, there is two car off street parking.   Bonus! Two years left on the tax abatement!

title: Brand New One Bedroom Apartment for rent
description: Don’t miss the chance to live in the lovingly restored façade of the Royal Theater on the South Street West commercial corridor. As you enter this spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment, you’ll notice oversized windows overlooking the roof top garden, the hardwood floors throughout, recessed lighting, washer/dryer closet, the open floor plan living room and beautifully modern kitchen. The kitchen includes textured white subway tile back splash, quartz counter top, cool two tone cabinets, and stainless steel dishwasher, microwave, garbage disposal and electric range. The bathroom is located off of the living room and includes a shower/tub combo and sleek vanity. Continuing through to the bedroom, is a large walk-in closet and generously sized bedroom with a window overlooking more of the roof top garden and east bound on South St. The Royal Theater also features a shared roof deck, bike room, mail room, and trash room. Located on the South Street West commercial corridor on the border between Graduate Hospital and Rittenhouse, one block from the Lombard/South Broad St Line, and steps from the best bars, restaurants and retail shopping in the City including The Cambridge, Miles Table, Founding Fathers Sports Bar, Bob and Barbara’s and more
